ships.name: Bioship Beta
ships.text: When defending, during the Compare Results step, you may cancel 1 [hit] result. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

captains.name: Bioship Beta Pilot
captains.text:
When attacking, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may re-roll 1 of your blank results.

If your ship was just destroyed and another friendly ship is within Range 1-2 of your ship, you may replace that ship's Captain Card with this card. If this Captain Card fielded an [talent] Upgrade, you may assign that Upgrade to the new ship as well, if possible.

upgrades.name: Telepathy
upgrades.text: You may discard this card immediately before you move in order to change your Maneuver for that round.

upgrades.name: Biological Weapon
upgrades.text:
ATTACK: Discard this card to perform this attack.
If this attack hits, in addition to normal damage, discard 1 [crew] Upgrade of your choice on the defending ship for each [battlestations] result (max 2).

This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Species 8472 Bioship.

upgrades.name: Energy Blast
upgrades.text:
ATTACK: (Target Lock) Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack.

This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Species 8472 Bioship.

upgrades.name: Biological Technology
upgrades.text:
Place 1 Mission Token on this card at the start of each Planning Phase. When attacking, you may spend up to 2 of these tokens to add an equal number of attack dice. When defending, you may spend up to 2 of these tokens to add an equal number of defense dice.
This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Species 8472 Bioship and no ship may be equipped with more than 1 Biological Technology Upgrade.

upgrades.name: Biogenic Field
upgrades.text:
When defending, you roll +1 defense die (+3 vs a Borg ship). In addition, when an enemy card ability affects one of your cards, roll 1 attack die (3 against a Borg card ability). If you roll a [battlestations] result, the card effect is cancelled.

This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Species 8472 Bioship and no ship may be equipped with more than 1 Biogenic Field Upgrade.

upgrades.name: Electrodynamic Fluid
upgrades.text:
ACTION: Discard this card to immediately perform a 2nd maneuver from your Maneuver Dial with a speed of 3 or less.
OR
ACTION: Disable this card to perform a [sensor-echo] Action even if your ship is not cloaked.
This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Species 8472 Bioship.

upgrades.name: Fluidic Space
upgrades.text:
Instead of making a normal move, you may discard this card to remove your ship from the play area and immediately place it back anywhere in the play area, but not within Range 1-2 of any other ship. You cannot attack or perform any Actions on the round you use this ability.
This Upgrade costs +5SP if purchased for a non-Species 8472 ship and no ship may be equipped with more than 1 Fluidic Space Upgrade.
